subject: Re: First run, 12-469 in my apartment
author: ourobouros2k2
full_text:
Thanks K, just have to say I was not prepared for the immediate 
relevant responses I got. The skeptical side was expecting vague highly 
interpreted responses. Doing a followup tonight. Question though, to 
other users of the 469, do you prefer am band (got best results with 
am) or fm band? I know that nighttime am reception is much better, so 
it seems logical to stick with that during nighttime hours. Any 
thoughts?

thanks again
Andy
